SQL.LOAD: SELECT issue_id, issue_comment_type_id, code, text, display_on_web, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, issue_comment_id FROM elp_issue_comment WHERE issue_comment_id = :issue_comment_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT issue_id, issue_comment_type_id, code, text, display_on_web, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, issue_comment_id FROM elp_issue_comment WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.LOAD_COMMENT_LIST: SELECT issue_comment_id, issue_id, issue_comment_type_id, code, text, display_on_web FROM elp_issue_comment WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_issue_comment SET issue_id = :issue_id, issue_comment_type_id = :issue_comment_type_id, code = :code, text = :text, display_on_web = :display_on_web, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE issue_comment_id = :issue_comment_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_issue_comment ( issue_id, issue_comment_type_id, code, text, display_on_web, created_by, issue_comment_id ) VALUES ( :issue_id, :issue_comment_type_id, :code, :text, :display_on_web, :created_by, :issue_comment_id )
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT issue_comment_id FROM elp_issue_comment WHERE issue_comment_id = :issue_comment_id AND issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.GET_ISSUE_COMMENT_CODE: SELECT CODE FROM elp_issue_comment WHERE issue_comment_id = :issue_comment_id
